amendment.description: An amendment numbered 88 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of funds to be used for a new hire who has not been verified through the E-Verify program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A047) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: King (IA) amendment (A047) modified by unanimous consent. After the words "this Act" insert "or Divisions A, C, D, or F".
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A047) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. King (IA).
